title.jp: Hitome Atta Sono Hi kara, Kizuna no Hanasaku Koto mo Aru

synopsis: Agata Katsuhira is a strange young man who doesn't feel pain. One day, he encounters a mysterious young woman named Sonozaki Noriko, who changes his life, as well as the lives of his classmates forever.

title.jp: Konna Ijou Jitai Kantan ni Nomi Komen Nara Barium Nanza Bucket Nihai wa Karuku Yoyuu Dattsuno

synopsis: The kids are forced into doing self introductions... However, it appears that the self introductions that Sonozaki wants them to do requires much more than the usual name and what class they're in. They find out that every wrong answer has a penalty, and painfully learn that they are indeed connected to each other...

title.jp: Donna ni Sanzan na Joukyou Datte Torae Kata Shidai de Nantoka Yatteikeru kamo...... ne?

synopsis: The kids find out that there's actually one other Kiznaiver, and they go to find this mysterious figure.

title.jp: Sekkaku Tsunagari Attandashi sa Motto Otagai Wakariaou yon

synopsis: The kids get to know Hisomu and Sonozaki promises to let them know a secret about Kiznaivers if they agree to go to a summer training camp.

title.jp: Hyahhoi, Gasshuku Daa! Shika no Fun Funde Makuranage shite Go Go!

synopsis: The Kiznaivers get to their training camp and are faced with the summer favorite, the test of bravery. Meanwhile, Chidori runs off on her own and the others realize that they might be connected by other means than just their pain.

title.jp: Anta-tachi to Iru to Hontou ni Rokuna Koto ga Nai

synopsis: Something from Honoka's past comes back to haunt her, and Nico makes another attempt at becoming her friend.

title.jp: Nana-bun no Ichi no Itami no Sono Mata Nanabai no Shoutai ni Fureru Tatakai

synopsis: The Kiznaivers find out the truth about Maki's past, and try to help her overcome it.

title.jp: Happy na Jikan tte Sousou Nagaku wa Tsuzukanai Mono da yo ne

synopsis: The Kiznaivers get stuck in a building during a typhoon and some hidden feelings start to come to light.
The Kiznaivers start to hear each others thoughts, which makes things even more complicated. Meanwhile, a secret about Sonozaki and Katsuhira is revealed.

title.jp: Suki na Kimochi ga Mukuwarenai Kamo Nante Juujuu Shouchi no Ue Daro?

synopsis: The Kiznaivers all go their own ways. Meanwhile, Katsuhira finds out the truth about the Kizna Experiment and about Sonozaki's past.

title.jp: Ichiichi Renraku Shiatte Kimochi wo Kakunin Shiawanaito. Datte, Tomodachi Nanda kara!

synopsis: Katsuhira finds out what happened to the friends from his childhood and Sonozaki is intent on making the Kizna Experiment successful no matter what.

title.jp: Sekaijuu ni Kizuna System ga Hirogatte

synopsis: Katsuhira catches up to Sonozaki in order to try to stop her from trying to connect everyone to the Kizna System.
